title: Implement Customer_Analyzer sync job to ingest fit score, segment, and approved positioning blocks

sections.text: Create the backend sync mechanism that pulls account-level fit score, segment, and only approved positioning blocks from Customer_Analyzer into Sales_Accelerator. Persist the data in a dedicated integration table/model keyed by CRM account/opportunity IDs and store the source timestamps/version for change detection. This ticket covers ingestion + persistence only (no UI or guidance generation) and should include basic retry/backoff and logging for failed syncs.
